name: Super Rumble: Future Champions (as a Programmer in 2022)
name_original: Super Rumble: Future Champions (as a Programmer in 2022)
description:
an Action Platformer android games for Nixerd Hero that I do the programmer work using Unity. This game is a compilation from others mini game with the same gameplay with improvement along the project goes, such as AI behavior, new characters and their abilities, arena, etc. Here's the list of mini game I mean:

  1. Super Rumble: Hero vs Villain
  2. Super Rumble: Robot War
  3. Super Rumble: Spider v Monster
  4. Super Rumble: Speedster Clash
  5. Super Rumble: Secret Agents
  6. Super Rumble: Hero War
  7. Super Rumble: Villain War
